thread.section_title: Nengun Performance評価／レビュー | お客様は Nengun Performanceの評価／レビューをしました。 | nengun.com
thread.title: Mitch
thread.title_full: Nengun Performance について 投稿者 Mitch

author: Mitch
title: Mitch
text:
Incorrect product sent, plus damage.
Nengun "customer service" reps passed case around, were not knowledgeable on product and ultimately decided to wipe their hands of the issue by claiming that the part manufacturer said it would be fine.
Multiple images of incorrect parts and production damage supplied, but nothing was done to resolve issue.
I am now $2,400 out of pocket. I have used nengun in the past, but never again. Product was an ORC twin plate clutch. If you purchase something from this site, and there is an issue with your product, you will be stuffed as they take no accountability acting as a middle man between the customer and manufacture.
